overview:
Juha has a combination of professional experience in the venture capital and ICT industries. Before joining Nordic Venture Partners in 2007, Juha worked with Aura Capital where he has completed a number of early stage VC investments across different technology sectors in Finland. His prior work experience includes sales and international business development in the software industry, latest at QPR Software which is a Finnish enterprise software company listed in the Helsinki Stock Exchange.

Juha’s academic credentials include an M.Sc. in Industrial Management from Helsinki University of Technology.

email: jl@nordic.com
